thread.title: "Zebra" Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Store List
thread.title_full: "Zebra" Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Store List

author: Kyle Rooney
title: "Zebra" Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Store List
text:
Home > Sneakers > "Zebra" Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Store List "Zebra" Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Store List 2 0 Posted by Kyle Rooney , Feb 21, 2017 at 04:59pm Good luck copping these Yeezys. 
The Zebra striped Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 ($220) will be releasing this Saturday, February 25th but if you're hoping to get your hands on a pair you're going to need to say a few hail marys, rub your lucky rabbit's foot for 24 hours straight, and grab a box of four-leaf clovers. 
Registration for the Yeezy Boost 350 V2 is now open through the Adidas Confirmed App, with reservations going live on Wednesday, February 22nd at 4pm EST, but only four Adidas locations are taking reservations. 
Some other sneaker boutiques will likely be receiving the kicks as well, but it has become quite clear that this colorway will be far more limited than the recently released "Black/Red" Yeezy Boost 350 V2. 
As of now, check out the following Adidas retailers that will definitely have the Zebra Yeezys in stock this weekend and stay tuned for updates as more stores confirm the release. 
Adidas Originals Store Aventura
